# Rows

```{r}
devtools::document()
pkgload::load_all()
tt(x, output = "tblr") |>
  spec_row(i = 2:3, fg = "blue6", bg = "pink", font="\\bfseries")
```

# Cells

## Spanning cells

```{r}
# r=3: cell spans 3 rows
# c=2: cells spans 2 columns 
tt(x, output = "tblr") |>
  spec_cell(i = 2, j = 1, r = 3, c = 2, bg = "pink")
```
